text: O te, kotoryye uverovali! Allakh obyazatel'no podvergnet vas ispytaniyu okhotnich'yey dobychey, kotoruyu smogut dostat' vashi ruki i kop'ya, chtoby Allakh uznal tekh, kto boitsya Yego, ne vidya Yego voochiyu (ili vtayne ot lyudey). A kto prestupit granitsy dozvolennogo posle etogo, tomu budut ugotovany muchitel'nyye stradaniya
